Paragraph: 11 Our preliminary investigation on the photovoltaic properties of PCDSeBT in typical BHJ devices with [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) shows a highly respectrable PCE of 4.12% on account of the high J SC and V OC .

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "BHJ devices" (this is a type of device, not a material name)
* "6,6" (this is a number, not a material name)
* "phenyl" (this is a chemical group, not a material name)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
